structure.unit: FORMALITY AND ASSIGNABILITY OF CONTRACTS -- INSTALLMENT SALES CONTRACTS

law.catch_line: KRS 371.210 to 371.330 do not affect validity of pre-1963 contracts.
law.text: The provisions of KRS 371.210 to 371.330 shall not invalidate or make unlawful retail installment contracts or retail charge agreements executed prior to January 1, 1963.
